item.title: Why I Use Neovim And Not A Normal Editor
item.description: As someone who’s always given a lot of importance to the concept of a streamlined workflow, I’ve always been on the lookout for the best possible tools for what I do. One of the most important tools someone like me can use is the Text Editor. There are many popular Editors and IDE’s out there, and I have tried many of them. For the better part of the last year I have been “Editor Hopping” in search of something to replace what I used to use, which was Apache’s NetBeans IDE.
